title: Get Ready With Me: Concert Day
description: Get Ready With Me: Concert Day is a beauty game where you join teen Riri in preparing for the concert of a lifetime. Customize her signature cowgirl hat, experiment with bold makeup, choose jaw-dropping outfits, and accessorize for a complete look. Take your fashion game to the next level by trying out different hair color options, from vibrant hues to subtle highlights. Get ready to stand out from the crowd and have fun in this exciting makeover adventure!
